ygData.subject: OT: Moderator Notes
ygData.msgSnippet: I have adjusted settings so that all posts made by *new* members require moderator approval.  This is to keep spammers from flooding this group with messages.

X-Yahoo-Profile: dph_of_rules

I have adjusted settings so that all posts made by *new* members 
require moderator approval.  This is to keep spammers from flooding 
this group with messages.

It also serves to keep out anybody new from asking the stupid question 
of what's the password for registered glad.

* * * Other * * * 

I have been thinking that this group might be best kept for making 
announcements about the game since at the current time there is no way 
to appoint more moderators and establishing another group for the sole 
purpose of having a ongoing discussion about gladiator without 
agitating folks who are just subscribed to keep up with announcements 
about the game.
